thread.section_title: Vapornation Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vapornation | vapornation.com
thread.title: Jesse Wolven

author: Jesse Wolven
title: Jesse Wolven
text: I found a error on their website cause what they had written down was one of the key reasons why I bought what I bought. Thankfully after talking to someone about the situation I was given a discount to put towards any of my future purchases. So far love the APX Wax Vape Pen I got works like a charm and don't have a single complaint or issue yet and the customer service has been wonderful helping me with any and all questions and or issues I may have had.
